title: Shooting Star
contents: text | Shoots a blast of heat from the caster’s palm that slams into the target.
text | Caster rolls [SPI] (1 die) and deals damage to target equal to that amount.
description | Incantation | If spell book is lost, magic user is unable to cast this until it is replaced.
text | Can be cast instantaneously. If during combat, takes effect once successfully cast.
